trends: There has been one other sighting in Sea Isle City
There were no other sightings in Sea Isle City on or around July 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWatching the fireworks on the beach. 6 or 7 orbs traveled in formation from offshore in the NW traveling to the E past the fireworks we were watching. Hundreds of people witnessed them. They flew out over the Atlantic Ocean and slowly disappeared. Could of been Chinese lanterns I guess. Definitely were not planes. It seems as if there are a lot of reports of orange orbs on July 4, 2011.
